name: Super Mario 2D World + Palutena's Fury
description:
A port of my biggest open-world game from Scratch.

Original Game: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/682844434

Original Description:

Instructions

- Arrow Keys to move

- Z to sprint 

- Space to jump 

- Up arrow to enter doors 

- Click on enemies to damage them 

- Number Keys to cycle through hotbar 

- X to use items 

Notes and Credits

The Aether inhabitants from Mario X Minecraft 17 try to seek revenge by invading Mario's homeland, and it's up to Mario to try and prevent that. It's easier said than done though, since that rogue goddess from Mario X Minecraft 17 is wreaking lots of havoc. 

This game combines elements and ideas from: Minecraft, Super Mario Bros. 1-3, Super Mario World, Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury, Super Mario Maker 1 and 2, and Super Mario Odyssey. 

This game is another experiment with an open-world 2D game. 

Shoutout to Turbowarp because 99% of this project's development took place on Turbowarp. Also big shoutout to @SpideyPlaysMC for his 'Super Mario World Maker' project, which has lots of SMW assets for me to use, saving me the trouble of having to crop them from a sprite sheet myself. 

Check out more Mario X Minecraft games here: https://scratch.mit.edu/studios/25427994 

Most assets belong to Nintendo and Mojang.
